fields.invalidSignupMenuCommandMessage:

fields.askQuantityMessage:
Sweet! First, what's the total number of {{rb_noun}} you {{rb_verb}}?

Send the exact number back.
fields.invalidQuantityMessage:

fields.askPhotoMessage: Nice! Send your best pic of you and the {{quantity}} {{rb_noun}} you {{rb_verb}}.
fields.invalidPhotoMessage:
Sorry, I didn't get that.

Send a photo of the {{rb_noun}} you have {{rb_verb}}.

If you have a question, text {{cmd_member_support}} - I'll get back to you within 24 hours.
fields.askCaptionMessage: Got it! Now text back a caption for your photo (think Instagram)! Keep it short & sweet, under 60 characters please.
fields.askWhyParticipatedMessage: Last question: Why was participating in {{title}} important to you? (No need to write an essay, one sentence is good).

fields.scheduledRelativeToSignupDateMessage:
Have you completed {{title}} yet?

fields.memberSupportMessage:
Text back your question and I'll try to get back to you within 24 hrs.

If you want to continue {{title}}, text back {{keyword}}
fields.campaignClosedMessage:
